text: A good tea at a bulk price. It tastes good and I got enough that I can drink it fairly often without spending a lot of cash, what more can I say?You have to be careful with this tea, overbrewing will make it very bitter. I normally leave my tea in longer than recommended because I like stronger flavor, but this was a little much even for me. After about 6 minutes it starts to taste like coffee...It tastes great, but its not terribly fragrant, which is half of the appeal for me. My coworkers can always tell when I have my Earl Grey, but this just smells like mild vanilla. The string on the bag is not the strongest, and several times has pulled off the bag, leaving the bag to sink to the bottom of my vacuum flask.All in all, I'd buy it again but this might not be what I serve guests.

title: Mashuga Far East Sweet & Savory Pecans, 2.25-Ounce Pouch (Pack of 12)
text: Based on the other two reviews I was expecting more of a classic sweet and savory experience. My experience with these was that the spice overwhelms the sweet, while the salty is almost too faint to notice. The heat from the chili spice lasts way too long for a product advertising itself as sweet and savory. These really are more of a spiced nut than sweet and savory. If you like heat with a trail that lasts for minutes, this is your product. If you don't, try something else.

title: Mashuga Far East Sweet & Savory Pecans, 2.25-Ounce Pouch (Pack of 12)
summary: Totally delicious, chic yet humorous packaging
text: Delicious crunchy little nosh in exactly the right portion, these pecans are so tasty one might be tempted to over-indulge if the bag were bigger. Purchased on Manager's Special price so not too too pricey but this is a premium nosh, would win big points if packed in an adult foodie's lunch bag.

title: Mashuga Far East Sweet & Savory Pecans, 2.25-Ounce Pouch (Pack of 12)
text: I've had other Mashuga Nuts before, but hadn't tried this particular flavor until they went on sale, in bulk. I figured if I didn't like them my family and co-workers would...They are delicious! :)(I was a little put off by the fact that the ones I received had a sell by date that was only a few months away from the time I received them. Hopefully the ones you receive won't be like this.)

title: China Mist Leaves Pure Teas Black Currant Hot Tea Bag - 100 CT
text: We first tried the black currant variety at a restaurant, and then ordered for home. It's top quality black tea with very unobtrusive hint of black currant. Contrary to common black currant teas, it is not acidic at all, just a very sophisticated flavor. It is distributed mostly at restaurants and rather expensive to buy, but it's so good, almost addictive.

title: Kit Kat Dark Chcolate (36 count)
text: OH MY JESUS, THESE ARE SOOOO GOOD!!! They are so hard to find though, but when I do I buy a bunch because they are so tasty and perfect, way better then regular kit kats. There is just something about dark chocolate that makes everything taste wonderful. If you get a chance to try these, you wont be sorry.

title: Kit Kat Dark Chcolate (36 count)
text: Unfortunately I can't see to get these for some reason, but when I did try some samples around Christmas, they were super. I have been looking for a store that sells them without any luck. I hear I can get them from Japan, but at what price?

title: Kit Kat Dark Chcolate (36 count)
text: KitKat Dark Choclate are to die for if you can get your hands on them!!!

title: Gerber Graduates Microwaveable Meals Pasta Pick - Ups Chicken & Carrot Ravioli - 12 Pack
text: My daughter (22 months old) is a picky eater, and we bought this to try and she just love it..... she likes Chicken and Ravioli and Beef and Tomato Ravioli.... It has no sauce, so is mess free and she would it them all!!!!! I would recommend this to everybody!!!

title: Cheerios Cereal Cups, 1.3-Ounce Boxes (Pack of 24)
text: I recently lost 60 pounds. Part of the way I did it was to have the same easy breakfast of cherios with skim milk and a piece of fruit. I do it religiously and without variation. The cup makes it more convenient. I hope this doesn't sound too much like a commercial.

title: ZoZo Beans Dark Chocolate Espresso Beans, 2-Ounces (Pack of 12)
summary: It is a great energy sources! It is not very sweet also.
text: I love this chocolate espresso Beans, compare to other products,this one has a better balance of chocolate and the espresso beans, it is a great energy sources and not that very sweet.

title: Certified Organic Wheat - 25 Lbs - For Wheatgrass Juice, Sprouting Seeds, Food Storage, Ornamental Grass & More.
text: I am on my third batch with these seeds and they are preforming as well as others I have bought before. The blades or stalks are full and lush with great color. I use potting soil, vermicite, peat moss and azomite blend in the soil. Grows great!

title: Certified Organic Wheat - 25 Lbs - For Wheatgrass Juice, Sprouting Seeds, Food Storage, Ornamental Grass & More.
text: I have little luck with this seed and am very disappointed. I have tried several batches and get 10-15% yield from them. I do not know if the is old seed or what the problem is. Wheatgrass will usually grow no matter what so I gotta believe the seed is not optimal. Very expensive waste of time and money for me = (

title: Certified Organic Wheat - 25 Lbs - For Wheatgrass Juice, Sprouting Seeds, Food Storage, Ornamental Grass & More.
summary: Want Wheatgrass Daily.? Buy in Bulk.!
text: Just a note to endorse the quality and economy of this product. I have grown wheatgrass on and off for years..decided to go "all in", and add to my (protein heavy) diet daily. At approx.6oz. seed/flat, that's 65 weeks of fresh grass for $40.! The quality/sproutability of this seed far surpasses that of my local health food store.

title: Certified Organic Wheat - 25 Lbs - For Wheatgrass Juice, Sprouting Seeds, Food Storage, Ornamental Grass & More.
summary: Certified Organic Wheat - 25 Lbs - For Wheatgrass Juice, Sprouting
text: Arrived promptly with no problems. I do not use for juiceing. I raise organic chickens and grow the grass for them (winter only). Germination is excellent and the chicks just love it. For the uninformed, the grass makes for deep, rich, yellow yolks.

title: Certified Organic Wheat - 25 Lbs - For Wheatgrass Juice, Sprouting Seeds, Food Storage, Ornamental Grass & More.
text: I am new to growing wheatgrass & am very glad this was not the brand I tried first. I had been using some from healthy-eating and was quite happy with it (the only other brand I've tried so far) but decided to try this one because it is about half the price. Wish I had only bought 10 lbs. instead of 25. The grass here is very slow to grow and sparse and patchy.

title: Scott's Cakes Maple Walnut Fudge Balls in a Decorative Bag
text: These looked wonderful and were a birthday present for a close friend. When they came the foil was all stuck to the candy. We tried to unwrap a couple and it made a bigger mess with the paper sticking terribly to the candy. In the end we were able to taste the tiniest piece which just made us more disappointed and angry since it was delicious. We would never order these again or do business with this company. And living in Florida was not the problem since we paid BIG prices for the candy and shipping, it was not hot and the package was literally put in our hands from the truck, so it didn't sit outside. Big Big disappointment.

title: Scott's Cakes Vanilla Fudge Balls in a Decorative Bag
text: These were delicious, but not wrapped as well as I think they should be. They kind of melted out of their wrapping.

title: Hain Pure Snax Mini Munchies Mini Rice Snacks, White Cheddar, 3-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
summary: Hain White Cheddar Popped Corn Mini Cakes
text: These are pretty bad. I had tried the mild cheddar variety and liked those quite a bit, so I bought 12 packs of each. I opened a bag of the white cheddar and was amazed at how unpleasant they tasted (didn't taste white cheddar) - now I'm stuck with 11 bags! I'll sell them to you half price!!

title: Hain Pure Snax Mini Munchies Mini Rice Snacks, White Cheddar, 3-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
summary: Crispy and crunchy like tortilla chips
text: I was surprised by the texture of these. I thought they'd be airy and crunchy, like regular rice cakes. However, they're much more dense and crispy, like a tortilla chip. They're not as cheesey as they could be either, but that helps to keep the sodium levels down.

title: Individually Wrapped Blue and Gold Sauce Pump
summary: It worked well while it worked
text: Just like my title says, it worked just as it's supposed to until it suddenly stopped working. I am ordering both 64 oz bottle and a small squeeze bottle so I could keep refilling small squeeze bottle with the big bottle.

title: Individually Wrapped Blue and Gold Sauce Pump
text: This is certainly worth the money, it is easy to use and it doesn't drip sauce all over the place :)

title: Hain Pure Snax Mini Munchie Rice Cakes, Apple Cinnamon, 3.50-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
text: Hain Mini Apple Cinnamon Rice Cakes are a tasty, low-calorie and very filling and satisfying snack. Anytime you are in the mood for something crunchy, just reach for a bag of these wonderful healthy and delicious rice cakes.

title: China Mist Leaves Pure Teas Toasted Rice Green Hot Tea Bags
summary: Who Knew Green Tea Could Taste so DELICIOUS
text: I recently tried this tea and was impressed from the first sip: it has a nutty complexity that does not get in the way of the satisfying, well-rounded green tea flavor. Doesn't need sugar, honey -- anything! What a find!

title: China Mist Leaves Pure Teas Toasted Rice Green Hot Tea Bags
text: I'm usually one to get bored with something and move on to new things. However, I have been drinking this tea for years (I'm still drinking it in 2010, 3 years after my initial 2007 review!!). It doesn't get bitter, unlike many other teas, no matter how long you steep it. It is balanced, sweet, and smooth all on it's own--no need for extra sugar or honey to make this a great, refreshing tea.

title: China Mist Leaves Pure Teas Toasted Rice Green Hot Tea Bags
summary: Doesn't get any better than this!
text: I have tried many different flavors and types of green tea, but this is by far the most enjoyable. You can drink this all day. Such a smooth, wonderful taste. Highly recommended. Try it...you will love it!

title: China Mist Leaves Pure Teas Toasted Rice Green Hot Tea Bags
text: This is the only green tea that reminds me of my years in Japan. SUPERB!

title: China Mist Leaves Pure Teas Toasted Rice Green Hot Tea Bags
text: Toasted Rice Green - 100 CTThis tea taste great--mild with toasted rice aroma--AND it's a great buy. If you drink a lot of green tea, this is the one you want.

title: Hain Pure Snax Rice Cakes, Apple Cinnamon, 6.4-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
text: For such a light snack, these are surprisingly tasty and satisfying. If you need a sweet to tie you over till mealtime or as a desert substitute after lunch, grab one of these and GO! Very portable, so you can eat on the go without mess or utensils. Try them!

title: Harmony Farmer's Market Fruit Mix, 7-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
text: I had thought this would be full of dried fruits and nuts ( in other words, healthful) but it's really just sugar laddened bits of hard fruits and only flavorless peanut pieces. I have given the local food bank all but the one package I opened which made me feel so unwell that it's now in the rubbish. I am truly very disappointed in this product. It's description belies it's reality. If sugar is contraindicated in your diet....steer clear of this product!! It's low in salt and low in fat but so over sugared as to be actually nauseating. It's too bad because it sounded delicious and so nutritious. All I can say is YUK!!! I suggest you leave this product alone unless you think high sugar is good for you.

title: Harmony Farmer's Market Fruit Mix, 7-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
summary: All the flavors of the farmer's market...if your farmer harvests only sugar...
text: These types of fruit mixes live or die on the basis of how well the flavors in the package complement one another. The best of these kinds of things mix sweet fruit with sour or salty or chocolate or something else.Not this one. It's just cloyingly sweet on top of cloyingly sweet. There are several types of dried fruit in the bag, but there's so much added suger they all taste the same. Basically, everything is a little sweeter than normal raisins. This may appeal to the kids in your house, but the adults will want to approach this stuff with caution. You might be able to make this stuff edible by mixing it yourself with other (less sweet) things, but taken as-is you'll probably consider this mix to be almost inedible in anything but modest amounts.

title: Harmony Farmer's Market Fruit Mix, 7-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
text: this was a great buy. i got it on the subscribe and save plan so i could save even more. definately worth it as a healthy snack

title: Harmony Spicy Cha Cha Snack Mix, 4-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
summary: Stuff is great but don't buy here
text: Cha Cha Mix is definitely tasty, but don't buy it in bulk here because it turns rancid and you can't return food to Amazon. The first few bags were super but bag five, which was still in code, tasted nasty, as did bag six. I didn't open any more and contacted Harmony and they sent me a coupon for a free bag but that doesn't make up for the eight yucky ones I'm stuck with.

title: Harmony Spicy Cha Cha Snack Mix, 4-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
text: Forget any "tex mex" mix you've ever had, this stuff is BETTER! This includes your basic sesame and corn sticks, almonds and peanuts, but this adds corn nuts, pumpkin kernels and spices it up with not only chili, but lemon! Neither spice (chili/lemon) is overpowering, they complement each other resulting in an addicting and healthy snack. If you like tex mex blends, you have to try this...it is sooooo much better!!

title: Harmony Spicy Cha Cha Snack Mix, 4-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
text: It as stale as it can get! Shredded Paper with someSeasoning salt would taste better!

title: Orville Redenbacher's Gourmet Microwavable Popcorn, Old Fashioned Butter, 6-Count Boxes (Pack of 6)
text: Looks white and fluffy no dyes, but leaves your hands greasy. Is more calories than Act II.

title: Orville Redenbacher's Gourmet Microwavable Popcorn, Old Fashioned Butter, 6-Count Boxes (Pack of 6)
text: Just like the name says it harkens back to good old days when you had to mix the oil and corn in the old electric popcorn popper and then pour melted butter over it. If you want the Lite popcorn (or styrofoam pellets), this version isn't it.For an old theatre manager, this popcorn is the best!

title: Orville Redenbacher's Gourmet Microwavable Popcorn, Old Fashioned Butter, 6-Count Boxes (Pack of 6)
text: Why is it that every single time I purchase Redenbacher popcorn through Amazon, it's stale? It took me 3 tries to figure it out, but I won't be ordering it from them again.

title: Harmony Sesame Sticks Snack Mix, 4-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
text: They are the basic sesame stick. I have had better ones but atleast they do not contain any of those yucky ingredients that are so bad for out bodies.

title: Harmony Up & At 'Em, 5-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
text: These snax are fantastic ! Full-size berries, and lots of them. A bit sweet for breakfast, but make a great snack. Unfortunately we could not enjoy the whole case, my dog found it and ate about 8 of the pouches !

title: Harmony Up & At 'Em, 5-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
text: This is a tasty mix. Don't expect it to be too healthy, but it's better for you than candy!

title: Harmony Up & At 'Em, 5-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
text: Great product---what else can I say? While I lived in the caribbean, I ordered food since it was too expensive to buy good quality food there.

title: China Mist Leaves Pure Teas Sweet Chamomile Herbal Hot Tea Bag 100ct
text: This is the best chamomlie tea I've tasted! I'm not a tea connoisseur, so this review won't be fancy. All I have to say is it's great. I'm hooked!

title: China Mist Leaves Pure Teas Sweet Chamomile Herbal Hot Tea Bag 100ct
text: Great service. It arrived on time to give as a Christmas gift. My daughter loves the product. We will order again.

title: China Mist Leaves Pure Teas Sweet Chamomile Herbal Hot Tea Bag 100ct
text: This is the best chamomile tea I have ever had. It requires very little sugar and just tasts wonderful. I am very happy with this purchase.

title: China Mist Leaves Pure Teas Sweet Chamomile Herbal Hot Tea Bag 100ct
summary: best chamomile tea i've ever tasted
text: This is a naturally sweet tea that has a very soothing effect. I recommended it to help you relax.

title: 4-Pack - Anchovy Stuffed Olives by La Tienda
text: Having lived in Spain for 6 years when I was younger I remember going to street markets with my family and aways buying anchovy flavored olives to snack on. They always went very quickly, we all liked them. Not a fishy taste like you would expect but very salty and tasty, these are the closest thing I've found that compare to those.

title: 4-Pack - Anchovy Stuffed Olives by La Tienda
text: I purchased these olives for my dad, who first had them years ago. My cousin, who lived in Florida, would bring them when he came to Pennsylvania and my dad thought they were just great. Now Dad can enjoy them again.

title: Hot Sauce Harry's Texas Tech Red Raiders Tailgate Party Pack
text: This is a Christmas gift, so I personally haven't tried it, but I do like the packaging and how fast it got here. Great gift for a college kid and their room mates.

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Klassic 3 Seed, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
summary: crunchy snack in convenient 1 oz bags
text: These are the best crackers if you like extra crunch and lots of seeds. The bags are great for portion control. The bite size crackers are about an inch square. Put on a small square of cheese and get a real explosion of taste - but be sure to have a beverage on hand, to wash it down.

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Klassic 3 Seed, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
text: I buy these crackers at my local HEB store, although they are cheaper here at Amazon. I find them to be healthy and satisfy my need for something crunchy. They are very filling as well and easily satisfy my hunger craving. They are very hard, more so than the average cracker, but that is part of the fun! Lastly, they taste great! What more can you ask for!

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Klassic 3 Seed, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
text: When you read the (Klassic 3 Seed) ingredients, you can't dispute that this cracker is probably healthy.... but only if you can get it down. This has got to be one of the hardest, tasteless things I've ever eaten. I even tried this with different spreads. Eating healthy does not mean you have to sacrafice taste. I don't know who wrote the first couple of reviews but I'm convinced they must be associated with the manufacturer. Do yourself a favor... keep shopping. There are many other good tasting and good for you things out there to spend your money on. Hope my honestly helped.

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Klassic 3 Seed, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
text: Mimi, the Veggourmet in Virginia, turned me on to Doctor Kracker, and I can't thank her enough! These are delicious, nutritious, and addicting. Some complain because they are hard crackers, but I just find them hearty! Good for the heart and digestive system. Love them plain or paired with a spread. Terrific with soups. Love them! Thanks Mimi!Thanks Doctor Kracker!

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Klassic 3 Seed, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
summary: Great crunch, great taste, natural ingredients. A winner
text: We got introduced to Doctor Kracker a couple of years ago when my wife found them at Fresh Market. We all love them and have bought them in plastic containers since we first discovered them. It's a guilt-free snack that the whole family can agree on. Our three kids (9, 8, and 8) all love them. The crunch is incredible, I don't think I've ever had a cracker with more impressive crunchy texture. The flavor is muted, not extravagant or overwhelming. Just simple goodness. We get this Klassic 3 Seed, and we also get the Sunflower/Cheddar and the Seedlander. Now that they are being packaged in individual servings, they are great for school lunches and handy for packing to work or anywhere else. We use Subscribe & Save on Amazon to keep these babies in stock all the time. They are also great for dips, because they are so stout you don't have to worry about them breaking off in the dip, and they are way healthier than most other chips I see laid out with dips at parties.(I also highly suggest Stacy's Pita Chips for another great, healthy, crunchy accompaniment.)

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Klassic 3 Seed, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
text: great taste and very filling -- eat these at work a lot for energy and feeling full!

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Klassic 3 Seed, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
text: My whole family loves them. They are crunchy, tasty, filling and healthy all at the same time. My teen takes them to school for a snack and I munch on them all day long.--A bit addicting though!

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Klassic 3 Seed, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
text: These crackers truly have it all: they're healthy, organic, high in fiber, low in carbs, no added fats or oils, no trans-fatty acids. They're baked with valuable oil seeds and Omega 3 fatty acids along with whole grains and extra seed fiber.They're unbelievably crunchy and satisfying and the 1-ounce pouch provides just enough for a snack because if you bought the large container you would be left with an empty container.For once I found a snack that I believe will appeal to everybody. Try them for yourself and see if I'm not telling the truth then pass the rave review on to your friends and family.

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Klassic 3 Seed, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
text: One of the problems with being on a low carb diet is lack of "crunch". This is the product that helps. The small package is also useful to stop overindulgence. This will be a staple in my house.

title: Elevages Perigord Cassoulet in Glass Jar - 30 oz.
text: I actually tried this stuff, and I can't really recommend it in good faith. It looks good in the bottle, but no cigar. It tasted like grocery pork and beans.

title: Elevages Perigord Cassoulet in Glass Jar - 30 oz.
text: Elevages Perigord is a company that promotes cruelty towards defenseless animals. They torture and inhumanly treat animals. Please do your research about them if you are thinking of buying any of their products.Amazon, I will not shop your site until products from this company are discontinued.

title: Elevages Perigord Cassoulet in Glass Jar - 30 oz.
text: Please consider whether you want to buy and consume something that was created in an inhumane way. There is no humane way to create a product like this.

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Sunflower Cheese, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
summary: Healthier than other brands but not as good
text: I am trying to make healthier choices so I tried these. Hm-m-m-mThese crackers are very dry. They do have a subtle, interesting flavor but I find them impossible to chew and swallow without adding margarine, peanut butter or something. Sort of defeats the healthier thing I'm tryng to do.Therefore I rate them so-so.They do add something to my tomato soup if I break them over the top.

title: Acetaia Pedroni's exquisite blend of young and old traditional balsamic vinegars(Aceto Balsamico Vecchio)
summary: You will never go back to regular balsamic again..
text: This is the real deal. My husband and I visited the property and had the most amazing meal and picked up their balsamic afterwards. The real gem is the Maturo, but this will do for more every day use.Don't hesitate to pick this up - it'll change your life.

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Pumpkin Cheddar, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
text: This is not worth buying. Save your money they taste like you are chewing on a piece of cardboard and tasted like it too. Flavorless

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Pumpkin Cheddar, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
text: I think these crackers are wonderful!! I love the individual packages as they are great for on-the-go and portion control. I am a personal trainer and recommend these to everyone. They are high in fiber, low in carbs, and have a wonderful flavor. The bonus is they are organic & don't contain processed foods...all whole grains & essential fatty acids. What more could you ask for!!

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Pumpkin Cheddar, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
text: Make no mistake, this is a 'health food'. As such, it doesn't pack the taste- popping Frito-Lay brand kind of flavor, and thank goodness! What you get instead is a wholesome "REAL" flavor. You can tell by the taste what's it's made of: healthy ingredients, the good for you stuff. I sampled it at a women's expo, and just a few nibbles was enough to make me a customer.

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Pumpkin Cheddar, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
summary: Can you say cardboard with cheese flavor
text: Like the other Doctor Kracker Snack I reviewed they are as hard as a rock. Reminds me of pasteboard with cheese flavoring.

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Pumpkin Cheddar, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
summary: Very healthy but the flavor isn't great
text: I ordered these and got tired of them quick. I love healthy snacks but these lacked flavor and were almost too hard and crunchy to chew. I ate them with hummus which was ok, but when I tried to eat them plain, I couldn't even get through one little pouch. Great concept but needs more spices to make them tastier and more flavorful. I am dissapointed that I wasted my money because I still have almost all of the packages sitting in my cupboard and I probably won't eat them. My dog likes them though, so maybe they will become his treats for awhile so I don't feel guilty about throwing them away.

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Pumpkin Cheddar, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
text: I love these crackers. They are high fiber and low carb and remind me of a whole grain Cheeze-It. They are definitely dense and hearty so if you're not a fan of whole grain they might not be for you.

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Pumpkin Cheddar, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
text: As a person who abused his body for years with chemicals, purposely and unconsciously, I have to say that this is a good snack for someone who is looking to eat healthy. I am not 100% organic, but I have changed my diet considerably over the last 8 years. Even a few friends of mine who I turned on to these crackers have had a positive take on them. Thanx for a good little snack that is good for ya.

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Pumpkin Cheddar, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
summary: Dr. Kracker Snack Bag, Pumpkin Cheese
text: Dr. Kracker Snacker, Cheese Pumpkin, 8-Ounce Packages (Pack of 6)These are a little better than the sunflower seed kind. I don't know if I got a bad batch but they are a little stale this time.

title: Zen Mango Black Tea Bags - 25 CT
summary: Good Taste But There Is Better
text: This is a good tasting tea, but I found that the Mango Tea from "HAWAIIAN ISLANDS TEA COMPANY" is better tasting. The flavor is bolder, in my opinion.Mango Maui Black Tea 20 Tea bags

title: Immaculate Baking Company Cookies, Pumpkin Gingerlies, 1.25-Ounce Snack Bags (Pack of 32)
text: I love anything and everything pumpkin, whether sweet or savory it brings a smile to my fave and makes me feel warm, cozy and happy. Maybe that's why Halloween is my favorite holiday and I start celebrating it in September! Since pumpkin pie is my favorite dessert I ordered these Pumpkin Gingerlies simply because I have never had a pumpkin flavored cookie before. The beauty of the Immaculate Baking Co. is the deep flavor each tiny cookie has. Each little treat is about two bites and is satisfying and flavorful, I don't feel the need to eat a huge cookie when I can have one or two of these guys and feel my sugar cravings bite the dust!What hit me first was the spicy, tropical ginger, then the mellow buttery pumpkin, it really tastes like a mini pumpkin pie, crust and all. The flavor combination was superb, from peppery and zingy it melted into luscious, creamy milky pumpkin. These cookies are packaged in 2oz. bags that are easy to throw in my purse and take with me wherever the road leads that day. Each baggie is only 130 calories and these are so rich and delicious I feel like I am eating a whole pie and at times can't even finish the little bag. I love knowing they are all natural with no trans fats and the brand is not only eye catching but worth the consumer's time.For those who like their life a little sweet, a little spicy and definitely tasty this is the cookie for them! These were a lovely surprise but since trying few other flavors from Immaculate Baking Co I do not get surprised anymore, I know their cookies will taste great and I am never disappointed.- Kasia S.

title: Immaculate Baking Company Cookies, Pumpkin Gingerlies, 1.25-Ounce Snack Bags (Pack of 32)
summary: It doesn't get much better than this ...
text: This is yet another new favorite! I've tried several varieties of Immaculate Baking Company's cookies, and every time I try a new one, it becomes my "favorite"! This one is no different. It tastes like a "pumpkin pie" in cookie form, with a bit more "kick" than your typical pumpkin pie filling. I love the 2-oz snack bags -- otherwise, I'd be really pigging out on these. I just toss one in my book bag on my way out the door in the morning for a quick snack between classes (I'm a full-time student).Really, these are unusually good, high quality cookies. At about $.80 per pack, they're a good deal. As long as Amazon keeps stocking them, I'll keep buying them.

title: Immaculate Baking Company Cookies, Pumpkin Gingerlies, 1.25-Ounce Snack Bags (Pack of 32)
text: I love these little pumpkin cookies....I will give them out at Halloween and order more for myself. Great ingredients, and texture...and very pumpkin-y. I will buy again!Nancy L.

title: Immaculate Baking Company Cookies, Pumpkin Gingerlies, 1.25-Ounce Snack Bags (Pack of 32)
text: I have bought these cookies from a local health food store before, and if anyone is on the fence about trying them,they should go for it. They are tender cookies with a wonderful pumpkin/ginger taste. Luckily, this is for preportioned snack bags, or else you might end up eating all of them!

title: Immaculate Baking Company Cookies, Pumpkin Gingerlies, 1.25-Ounce Snack Bags (Pack of 32)
text: These cookies are awesome. I love pumpkin and ginger; and I really love them together! I like the snack size bags. That way I don't overeat.

title: Immaculate Baking Company Cookies, Pumpkin Gingerlies, 1.25-Ounce Snack Bags (Pack of 32)
text: The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is that it's an odd texture for me. It's kind of caught between being a hard and a soft cookie. It tastes great!! I love the blend of ginger and pumpkin. Sometimes, I'll bite into a small bit of a cookie that's got more ginger than others, but it's all good. Truly, the taste is wonderful, and getting 16 little bags of the morsels? Great snack bags to take to work or on the bus.

title: Durkee Grill Creations Kansas City Style Steak Seasoning ( Net Weight 6.20 oz )
text: The flavor of the "Kansas City " seasoning is terriffic. It is crowd pleasing. A great GRILLED flavor. Tastes like my favorite steak place!! Am terriffied that Durkee might try to change it!

title: Durkee Grill Creations Kansas City Style Steak Seasoning ( Net Weight 6.20 oz )
text: I called Spice Advice at 800-247-5251 and they told me that this Kansas City Steak, Weber (or Tones) Canadian Steak, and Grill Creations - Grill seasoning are all the same.However, if you are not convinced and want to order this under the Kansas City name, you can get it through diversified distributing (the distributor for Tones, Durkee, etc).I cannot verify that these are all the same. This is just what I was told.

title: Durkee Grill Creations Kansas City Style Steak Seasoning ( Net Weight 6.20 oz )
summary: Best grilling spice in the world.
text: I love this spice! It is coarse, flavorful and works on every meat. Walmart used to carry it and now it is only available through a vendor on Amazon. It is pricier than it was in the store but it is well worth it. I have tried others with the same like ingredients but they don't have the same boldness. Don't waste your time on others, spend the money and buy it!

title: Durkee Grill Creations Kansas City Style Steak Seasoning ( Net Weight 6.20 oz )
text: This is the best steak seasoning I've ever found in a store. I've established a great reputation for my steaks based on this seasoning. Unfortunately my local grocer stopped carrying it! I am worried I won't be able to find it any longer. It really is the best!!

title: Durkee Grill Creations Kansas City Style Steak Seasoning ( Net Weight 6.20 oz )
text: This is the best seasoning! I use it on chicken, salmon, hamburgers, sauteed squash and zucchini...it's the best and my family loves it!

title: Durkee Grill Creations Kansas City Style Steak Seasoning ( Net Weight 6.20 oz )
text: My husband's favorite steak seasoning, but hard to find in the grocery store. Glad I found it here--now he's happy!

title: Hidden Valley Cole Slaw Dressing, 16-Ounce Bottles (Pack of 6)
text: I have been having this sentfor many years from Seattle by my sister who lives threre, I find it fantastice where I want to put it on salads. If I am able to get it England that would be wonderful Obviuosly I would want to know the price and cost of sending it to me before I ordered it. It has helped me to lose over 60pounds in weight as I have it on my salads

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Seedlander, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
text: Vegan. Organic. Whole grain. Super premium. Crunchy. Little bite sized crackers covered with beautiful organic green pepitas (pumpkin seeds), small sesame seeds, and poppy seed dots. 120 calories per bag of about 10 mini-crackers. A portion controlled (1oz/28g) tasty indulgence of seed sprinkles on whole grain organic crackers. Made with organic whole grain spelt flour, organic pumpkin seeds, organic millet, organic agave syrup, organic poppyseed, organic spelt bran, organic sesame seeds, organic molasses, organic flax seeds, yeast, sea salt, and organic barley malt syrup. This review is out there for those for whom this makes a difference. See all of my reviews and the vegancompassion Profile for more great choices. Check out "Vegan Grocery Favorites" and "Vegan Grocery Top Ten" & all the other helpful "Vegan Grocery" Listmania. Your input counts and will be greatly appreciated to benefit the search of others. Thank you.

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Seedlander, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
text: If you're trying to replace junk food with something with some protein, fiber and snack a little smarter... these are deliciously nutty, sweet and salty and they have a satisfying crunch! They're also more filling than the average one ounce snack! They're yummy with a mozzarella cheese stick.

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Seedlander, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
text: All of the Dr. Kracker products, especially the 1 ounce single serving bags, have a great taste and are healthy for you. The taste alone is sufficient reason to purchase, being heart healthy is an extra added bonus!

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Seedlander, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
text: well, they don't taste like anything... and they're really hard to bite into - not crispy, just really hard. If you're a sailor from the eighteenth to ninteenth century and you're used to "ship's biscuit", then I'm sure you will love these as they've got more protein and better taste, and are also in nice sealed packages (no weavils!) They remind me of Woody Allen's line, "I could make a lot of money selling these in a health food store."I went for these because of all the rave reviews, and I am now dissapointed. I guess I can feed these to my boyfriend... he might eat them if he's really hungry and there's nothing else.

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Seedlander, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
summary: Good but hard. Just add juice.
text: These are very good but hard. I have a soft mouth so I add a little juice or tea and wait 10 minutes. They soften up very well.

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Seedlander, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
summary: One of the best crunchiest and healthist cracker ever
text: Doctor Kracker offers several varieties of crackers, but "Sedlander" is my favorite. It has organic pumpkin seeds, organic poppy seeds, organic sesame seeds and many other organic seeds. They are made with organic whole grain spelt flour. The small bag has 5 grams of protein and 3 grams of dietary fiber. This is a great substitute for unhealthy 'other' crunchie snacks. The case package of 24 one ounce bags makes the puchase very economical, especially with free shipping.

title: Doctor Kracker Snack Bag, Seedlander, 1-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 24)
summary: A healthy snack that doesn't taste like twigs.
text: Pros: portion controlled bags of 120 calories3 gr. of fiber5 gr. of proteinAlmost all the ingredients are organic220 mg sodium - not bad and the crackers are not that salty tasting4.5 gr. fatPlenty of crunching satisfactionCons: can't find anyThese taste great alone or if you like, for an additional 35 calories, spread them with a wedge of Laughing Cow Light cheese spread. Personally, I love 'em with butter (not exactly a low fat, healthy option, I admit).

title: 4-25 oz. bottles: 2 Real McCoy Mustard Sauce, 2 Orange-Berry Basil Dressing & Recipes
summary: The Real McCoy Mustard Sauce is VERY tasty......and unlike any sauce I can buy in NY.
text: I discovered this sauce when I went to Charleston, WV to see a pharmacy school with my son. It doesn't taste like any sauce I can get in Syracuse, NY. It's mustard based which I'm partial to. I used it to make home made chicken tenders.....I dipped the chicken in the the mustard sauce and rolled in panko crumbs...it's delicious. I hope Amazon gets this sauce in stock!

title: China Mist Leaves Pure Teas Ginger Ginseng Herbal Tea Bag- 25 CT
text: I first tried this tea after dinner at a restaurant in Napa and was instantly hooked. It is wonderfully fragrant and delicious and I'm not typically a big tea drinker. The only place I've been able to find it was a Dean and Deluca in Napa - quite a drive from San Jose just for tea. I'm thrilled to see it available on Amazon!!

title: Virginia Diner Gourmet Honey Toasted Cashews, 22-Ounce Tin
text: These are very good & super fresh. Highly recommended for any & all nut lovers. The salty & sweet plus the perfect crunch make these hard to beat.

title: Virginia Diner Gourmet Honey Toasted Cashews, 22-Ounce Tin
text: Man, you could just sit there behind a computer and much away a whole tin of these over the course of a few hours, and that's a lot of fat! So, these are so good I'd say that if you're trying to lose weight I'd stay away unless your doing about 5 miles a day on a treadmill, and then you'd still better have some discipline and just put...the...tin...away after a while. Man these are good!

title: Virginia Diner Gourmet Salted Jumbo Cashews, 20-Ounce Tin
text: I've never asked Amazon for a refund. This was a first. I read the reviews. All gave high ratings. My experience differs. Yes, the cashews are jumbo, in fact they're huge. However, they lacked flavor and many had a harder, more brittle texture then I'm use too. Oh well back to Planters.

title: Virginia Diner Gourmet Salted Jumbo Cashews, 20-Ounce Tin
text: The large cashews would get a 5, but there are filler chopped cashews that are not great.

title: Virginia Diner Gourmet Salted Jumbo Cashews, 20-Ounce Tin
text: I purchased this tin of cashews knowing it was 3.8 times the price of Planters cashews(per ounce). I was expecting a big richer taste and they were anything but. I don't understand the price because there's no reason to go back and buy more being that close to the industrial grade Planters in taste. I bought them for my wife and she said simply, "don't do that again".

title: Virginia Diner Gourmet Salted Jumbo Cashews, 20-Ounce Tin
text: Was expecting much better quality. A slightly stale taste with a minimum amount of sprayed on salt. Very disappointed with the nuts. If it wasn't such a hassle I would try for a refund.

title: Virginia Diner Gourmet Salted Jumbo Cashews, 20-Ounce Tin
text: I left reviews on some other nuts online. I stock up on nuts to have around the house and, with the benefit of Amazon, appreciate buying quality. These are quality jumbo cashews. Can't go wrong with them. I didn't rate 5 stars because, afterall, it's just a cashew! - but they are good ones.

title: Virginia Diner Gourmet Salted Jumbo Cashews, 20-Ounce Tin
text: These Virginia Diner cashews are the best ever. So fresh and huge, no little pieces. Great for suprise company! The can is empty quick. Stock up for the Hoildays, makes a great hostess gift.

title: Virginia Diner Gourmet Salted Jumbo Cashews, 20-Ounce Tin
text: These are soooooo good! I ended up eating the entire tin myself before hubby even got any. Oops:-O LOL BEWARE: These cashews are highly addicting!

title: Virginia Diner Gourmet Salted Jumbo Cashews, 20-Ounce Tin
text: Full of flavor, all whole cashews. I have tried nuts from other vendors and they just do not stack up to these babies. They are huge and they taste wonderful!

title: Virginia Diner Gourmet Salted Jumbo Cashews, 20-Ounce Tin
text: They were great, my groom is a huge cashew fan as is my mom and both were more than pleased. They are not heavily salted at all, we were pleasantly surprised, the salt is more of a fine powder than what you would expect from a salted product. They always live upto having the best peanuts in VA, we send them to people all over the country and they are all hooked!

title: China Mist Leaves Pure Teas Sweet Chamomile Herbal Tea Bag 25ct
text: This is my family's favorite tea - smooth, sweet, and just enough zing from the licorice to make your tongue tingle even after you swallo!

title: China Mist Leaves Pure Teas Sweet Chamomile Herbal Tea Bag 25ct
text: I first had this tea in a restaurant, immediately I tasted the natural sweetness of this tea. It was not a bitter tea,nor was it too sweet. It was like the perfect cup of tea.

title: Virginia Diner Gourmet Chocolate Covered Almonds, 20-Ounce Tin
text: The item was received before Xmas as planned. :-) I was impressed by that alone. They tasted awesome. I would purchase again!

title: Virginia Diner Gourmet Chocolate Covered Almonds, 20-Ounce Tin
text: This is the 2nd order for me. I give one can as a gift and keep the other for me. Great chocolate and good almonds. I think this is supposed to be good for you.

title: Virginia Diner Gourmet Chocolate Covered Almonds, 20-Ounce Tin
text: Chocolate is not smooth nor shiny over almonds. Taste all right. Not a thriller.

title: Virginia Diner Gourmet Chocolate Covered Almonds, 20-Ounce Tin
text: These taste good and are a nice gift as the tin is nice and big. The chocolate coating was good but could have been a little thicker. The double dipped peanuts by Virginia Diner are better due to the thicker chocolate coating on them but these almonds are also very good. I would buy them again.

title: Virginia Diner Gourmet Chocolate Covered Almonds, 20-Ounce Tin
text: These were absolutely delicious. I bought them as a treat for my co-workers, they disappeared very quickly. We couldn't stop eating them and will be ordering them again. They are not shiny covered almonds like we were expecting, rather they are hand dipped in a LOT of very good chocolate and have drizzles over the top and a flat bottom edge. Very fresh taste.

title: China Mist Leaves Pure Teas Organic Herbs & Spice Hot Tea Bags 25ct
text: Very nice combination of spices. Have orderered it for years. This is a new package but same recipe. Is unchanged.

title: 4-10 oz: Zest Sauce, Real McCoy Mustard Sauce, Wilted Lettuce Dressing, Orange-Berry Basil Dressing, Recipes
text: If you are looking for something new - You have to try this! I have been cooking everything with the Zest Sauce and the Real McCoy Mustard Sauce. The salad dressings are really tasty as well. No more same old same old. I am going to send this as gifts this year to all of my cooking friends.

title: 4-10 oz: Zest Sauce, Real McCoy Mustard Sauce, Wilted Lettuce Dressing, Orange-Berry Basil Dressing, Recipes
summary: zest sauce has tons of uses!!
text: I have been using zest sauce for years...so glad to see it on Amazon...it will be easy to get!I love it on grilled chicken. Mix about a 1/4 cup with fresh orange juice and rosemary. Also great on fish like this. It is also great in pasta salad.

title: 4-10 oz: Zest Sauce, Real McCoy Mustard Sauce, Wilted Lettuce Dressing, Orange-Berry Basil Dressing, Recipes
summary: Great flavors for a variety of foods
text: I can't tell you how often we use these products. Seems that just about every food (and drink) item we prepare can be enhanced by one of these Appalachian Mountain Specialty products. The Zest Sauce is good on just about everything and can really make a great Bloody Mary. I love the Mustard Sauce in my tuna salad. The recipes just get you started!

title: Peppercorns (White) Whole
text: I am very pleased with this purchase. I also bought the pink, black, green, & (sczhuan?) peppers.I am most please with the white ones. The pink were very unique, but not worth the extra money (or hassle, i hate that it doesnt work with a peppermill)hmm, what else...oh and shipping is EXPENSIVE. Might as well get a few bags, just make sure to use them within a few years..

text: We get a can every holiday time and love it.You've got the savory buttery cheddar cheese popcorn, caramel corn and kettle corn. What more can I say? It's popcorn, and it's Catoctin and it's very very good.

title: 3-25 oz bottles: 2 Real McCoy Mustard Sauce, 1 Wilted Lettuce Dressing & Recipes
summary: The Real McCoy Mustard Sauce is VERY tasty......and unlike any sauce I can buy in NY.
text: I discovered this sauce when I went to Charleston, WV to see a pharmacy school with my son. It doesn't taste like any sauce I can get in Syracuse, NY. It's mustard based which I'm partial to. I used it to make home made chicken tenders.....I dipped the chicken in the the mustard sauce and rolled in panko crumbs...it's delicious. I hope Amazon gets this sauce in stock!

title: Borsec Natural Sparkling Mineral Water 1.5L
text: A little less than 5 years ago, I traveled through Romania and Moldova. Of all the things that I fell in love with (and became a necessity during my trip), the different brands and locations of bottled water was one of them. After all, the region boasts a number of famous spas and springs. Anyway, this particular water is a little more salty tasting than other carbonated mineral waters, but is really enjoyable, smooth, and worth trying. Personally, I prefer it to some of the other more easily found sparkling waters that taste a little harsh and bland.

title: Sant' Eustachio Filtri Grind Coffee 8.8oz/250g (Filter Coffee)
text: THis is the best espresso I ever had at home. I enjoy a double shot of home brewed espresso several times a week. This is by far the best, reminds me of my 2 weeks in Italy last fall. Shopping on line from Gustiamo was easy, and the product arrived the next day from regular delivery. Can't wait to order again!!!!!!!!

title: Sant' Eustachio Filtri Grind Coffee 8.8oz/250g (Filter Coffee)
text: This coffee has a distinct flavor that is delicious! Ever since I tasted it I don't want to drink any other brand.
